articles.title: 에픽게임즈, EU 내 아이폰용 게임 스토어 개장…포트나이트 함께 출시 - 테크42
articles.description: Epic Games has announced plans to launch a game store on iPhone in the European Union this year. The company will also bring Fortnite back to the platform.
articles.content: Epic Games has announced plans to launch a game store on iPhone in the European Union this year. The company will also bring Fortnite back to the platform. The announcement comes in the wake of the E… [+489 chars]

articles.title: Apple announces changes to iOS, Safari, and the App Store in the European Union - Apple
articles.description: Apple announced changes to iOS, Safari, and the App Store impacting developers’ apps in the EU to comply with the DMA.
articles.content:
January 25, 2024
PRESS RELEASE
Apple announces changes to iOS, Safari, and the App Store in the European Union
